body_html: A word of caution - be very careful with cusparse, because for some routines it is calling cudaFree (grrrr!), which not only has performance implications, but will deadlock on multiGPU runs with nccl.
body_text: A word of caution - be very careful with cusparse, because for some routines it is calling cudaFree (grrrr!), which not only has performance implications, but will deadlock on multiGPU runs with nccl.
body: A word of caution - be very careful with cusparse, because for some routines it is calling cudaFree (grrrr!), which not only has performance implications, but will deadlock on multiGPU runs with nccl.
